name: See multiple products on the list
fullName: tests/features/productList.feature#See multiple products on the list
description:
As a logged-in user
    I want to see products on the product list
    So that I can select items to purchase

As a logged-in user
I want to see products on the product list
So that I can select items to purchase

Error: Assertion failed: Product Sauce Labs Bike Light is not visible on the product list - expect(locator).toBeVisible() failed
